constantValues: This entity is used to store social profile information of its associated account and contacts on different social channels.

definitions.description: This entity is used to store social profile information of its associated account and contacts on different social channels.

members.name: socialProfileId

constantValues: Unique Identifier of the social profile name.

members.description: Unique Identifier of the social profile name.

members.name: profileName

constantValues: Shows the name of the social profile on the corresponding social channel.

members.description: Shows the name of the social profile on the corresponding social channel.

members.name: profileFullName

constantValues: Shows the display name of the customer on this social profile.

members.description: Shows the display name of the customer on this social profile.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'SocialProfile' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

members.name: statusCode

constantValues: Reason for the status of the Social Profile

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'SocialProfile' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.description: Reason for the status of the Social Profile

members.name: blocked

constantValues: Identifies if the social profile has been blocked.

members.description: Identifies if the social profile has been blocked.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: community

constantValues: Identifies where the social profile originated from, such as Twitter, or Facebook.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'community_display' is added to the 'SocialProfile' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'community'
addSupportingAttribute.name: community_display

members.description: Identifies where the social profile originated from, such as Twitter, or Facebook.

members.name: influenceScore

constantValues: Shows the score that determines the online social influence of the social profile.

members.description: Shows the score that determines the online social influence of the social profile.

members.name: profileLink

constantValues: Shows the customer that this social profile belongs to.

members.description: Shows the customer that this social profile belongs to.

members.name: uniqueProfileID

constantValues: Unique ID of the Profile ID

members.description: Unique ID of the Profile ID

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.
